{{Wireless embedded system |brand=AVM |model=FRITZ!Box 4040 |revision=(HW227) |series=AC1300 |ean=4023125027673, 4023125027635, 4023125027833 |asin=B01L27NNAI;DE; |est_release_date=08/30/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.4 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4018 |cpu1_cspeed=710 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L25635EMI-12G |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16IP-D1 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4018 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=IPQ4018 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8075 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO |tp_firmware=LEDE Project |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=FRITZ!Box 4040 |default_ssid_regex=^FRITZ!Box 4040$ }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''400''' Mbps - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''1300 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AVM FRITZ!Box 4040 WLAN Router}} :''(AC1300, USB 3.0, Media Server)'' :{{ProductPage|https://avm.de/produkte/fritzbox/fritzbox-4040/}} *''Dual WLAN (AC+N), 867MBit/s (5GHz) + 400MBit/s (2.4GHz)'', :''4x Gigabit LAN, 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0, Media Server'' *[https://github.com/chunkeey/LEDE-IPQ40XX ''LEDE/Openwrt for IPQ4019/IPQ4028 devices'' on '''chunkeey'''] * {{boxmatrix|4040}} __NOTOC__
